Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.ex

Interface FoldingListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PyConsoleStartFolding, SoftWrapModelImpl

    public interface FoldingListener
    Defines common contract for clients interested in folding processing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void beforeFoldRegionRemoved(FoldRegion region)
      Informs that the given fold region is about to be removed.
      default void onFoldProcessingEnd()
      Informs that fold processing is done.
      default void onFoldRegionStateChange(FoldRegion region)
      Informs that 'collapsed' state of given fold region is just changed, or that the given fold region has just been created.

    • Method Detail

      • onFoldRegionStateChange

        default void onFoldRegionStateChange(FoldRegion region)
        Informs that 'collapsed' state of given fold region is just changed, or that the given fold region has just been created.

        Note: listener should delay fold region state processing until onFoldProcessingEnd() is called. I.e. folding model may return inconsistent data between current moment and onFoldProcessingEnd().

        Parameters:
        region - fold region that is just collapsed or expanded

      • beforeFoldRegionRemoved

        default void beforeFoldRegionRemoved(FoldRegion region)
        Informs that the given fold region is about to be removed.

      • onFoldProcessingEnd

        default void onFoldProcessingEnd()
        Informs that fold processing is done.
